name: Free Will to Free Will
description:
Will you use your Free Will to Free Will?

Developed in full during the IRXJam17 in 48 hours.

Controls:

W.A.S.D to move around
Space to Jump
Hold left ctrl to Crouch
Hold left mouse button to grab and interact with objects

Made by

David Haynes
https://twitter.com/denglish_design
https://denglishdesigner.itch.io

Sveinn Thor
https://twitter.com/ThorSveinn
